005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.IPv4AddressItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015import inet.ipaddr.ipv4.IPv4Address;
016
017/**
018 * An atomic Metapath item containing an IPv4 address data value.
019 */
020public interface IIPv4AddressItem extends IIPAddressItem {
021  /**
022   * Get the type information for this item.
023   *
024   * @return the type information
025   */
026  @NonNull
027  static IAtomicOrUnionType<IIPv4AddressItem> type() {
028    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.IP_V4_ADDRESS.getItemType();
029  }
030
031  @Override
032  default IAtomicOrUnionType<IIPv4AddressItem> getType() {
033    return type();
034  }
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new IPv4 item using the provided {@code value}.
038   *
039   * @param value
040   *          an IPv4 value
041   * @return the new item
042   */
043  @NonNull
044  static IIPv4AddressItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
045    try {
046      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.IP_V4_ADDRESS.parse(value));
047    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
048      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
049          null,
050          String.format("Invalid IPv4 address value '%s'. %s",
051              value,
052              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
053          ex);
054    }
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Construct a new IPv4 item using the provided {@code value}.
059   *
060   * @param value
061   *          an IPv4 value
062   * @return the new item
063   */
064  @NonNull
065  static IIPv4AddressItem valueOf(@NonNull IPv4Address value) {
066    return new IPv4AddressItemImpl(value);
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
071   *
072   * @param item
073   *          the item to cast
074   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
075   *         cast to this type
076   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
077   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
078   */
079  @NonNull
080  static IIPv4AddressItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
081    try {
082      return item instanceof IIPv4AddressItem
083          ? (IIPv4AddressItem) item
084          : valueOf(item.asString());
085    } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
086      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
087      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
088    }
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  IPv4Address asIpAddress();
093
094  @Override
095  default IIPv4AddressItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
096    return cast(item);
097  }
098
099  @Override
100  default int compareTo(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
101    return compareTo(cast(item));
102  }
103}
